attributes.action: Change the appointment procedure at GP Surgery
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick and need to make a appointment to see the Doctor. Call the GP Surgery and phone line is always busy. Then when I get through all appointments are gone for the day. Then they tell me to call back next day. So the same thing happens again, I can't get through to the Doctors Surgery when I need to see a Doctor.

rejection.details: Please be more specific about the government policy you would like implemented and resubmit
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
